content:
Hi All,

I am using a HAPI FHIR server that runs in Docker and all is going fine, up until the point I do a multi parameter search. When doing so, the server keeps on logging the error 'Failed to pre-expand ValueSet: Unknown code system http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-cm.' How can I resolve this? Do I need to include a coding system in the configuration .yaml file as implementation guide? If so, how should this be done? Hopefully someone can help me.
